issue.title: [C++] arrow-compute-asof-join-node-test crashes on s390x
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18301](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18301). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The code is most probably not big-endian compatible.
